document.full_text: alabama offensive lineman aaron douglas, a junior college transfer and onetime tennessee starter, was found dead on a second floor balcony after attending a party.
document.title: sports briefing | college athletics : alabama lineman found dead on a balcony in florida
lines_and_colors: alabama offensive lineman aaron douglas, a junior college transfer and onetime tennessee starter, was found dead on a second floor balcony after attending a party.
